name: Heisei Shin Onigashima: Zengohen
summary:
Heisei Shin Onigashima: Zengohen (Heisei Era New Island of Ogres - Part 1+2) is an Adventure game, developed by Pax Softonica and published by Nintendo. This version is the Wii U release, which contained both Zenpen and Kouhen parts in a single game.

Heisei Shin Onigashima is a port of BS Shin Onigashima, a four-part broadcast game released for the Satellaview (a Super Famicom peripheral). It was first released as a Nintendo Power downloadable game, then later released in two parts as cartridges (Zenpen, Kouhen), much like the original Famicom Disk System version was also divided in two parts.
